abstract: Global financial markets experience severe turbulence after British vote to leave European Union; anxious investors flock to safest bets amid uncertainty of unprecedented move's effect on global economy; re-emergence of nationalist and populist politics in West produces skepticism about globalized economy.

headline.print_headline: Turbulence, and a Lot of Uncertainty, for Investors as the Global Market Wobbles
headline.main: Turbulence and Uncertainty for the Market After ‘Brexit’

snippet: Britain’s vote to leave the Europe Union kicks off a fraught and unpredictable process likely to spook investors around the world.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s vote to leave the Europe Union kicks off a fraught and unpredictable process likely to spook investors around the world.
